title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Picture Layout, Library, Living Room, Dining and Breakfast Room", January 21, 1938
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 553-/1/4'-1'-0"/ANDERSON, OLSSON/JAN 21-38, 1/29/38, 1, D.D.; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, materials, instructions
description: Elevations showing picture layouts for library, living room, dining room and breakfast room. Pictures include oil paintings, watercolors, and prints.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Picture Layout, Library, Living Room, Dining and Breakfast Room", January 21, 1938.
January 21, 1938. Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-633.
